original_text: Paul and the two other men got in a ship and they sailed away from Paphos. They arrived at a town called Perga, which is in the region called Pamphylia. John Mark left them there and he returned to Jerusalem.
korean_text: 바울과 및 동행하는 사람들이 바보에서 배 타고 밤빌리아에 있는 버가에 이르니 요한은 그들에게서 떠나 예루살렘으로 돌아가고

sentences.original_text: Paul and the two other men got in a ship
sentences.korean_translation: 바울과 다른 두 사람이 배에 탔습니다

sentences.original_text: and they sailed away from Paphos
They arrived at a town called Perga
which is in the region called Pamphylia
